casebody.data:
WALLACE
v.
FT. MYERS PARTNERSHIP, et al. No. 257P08-2. Supreme Court of North Carolina. July 22, 2008. Coward Law Firm, Washington, DC, for Ft. Myers Partnership, et al.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 10th day of July 2008 by Plaintiff to Proceed in Forma Pauperis:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference this the 22nd day of July 2008."
